channel.title: Adding more than one item(s) on a line? URGENT :'(
channel.description:
Dear People of MoparScape,
I have a serious problem, it might be a dumb one, but a serious problem.
So it all started out when I thought to myself, hmmm I need to make some Donor packages, so I set off to making one. It's extremely simple, but I got too lazy to keep doing [code]c.getItem().addItem(###, #)[/code], so I started doing arrayOfItems. Although, when I compile, I have everything right... But, the arrayofItems variable cannot be found, or as stated in the compiler, cannot find symbol: variable arrayOfItems
Please help me :'(
EDIT: Nevermind, I put in a public int for the client and called back the items from the ClickItem.java HOWEVER, I still keep disconnecting after using the box!

item.title: Adding more than one item(s) on a line? URGENT :'(
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

post the code you tried using as well as a picture of the compiler error

Read full topic

Dear People of MoparScape,

I have a serious problem, it might be a dumb one, but a serious problem.

So it all started out when I thought to myself, hmmm I need to make some Donor packages, so I set off to making one. It’s extremely simple, but I got too lazy to keep doing c.getItem().addItem(###, #), so I started doing arrayOfItems. Although, when I compile, I have everything right… But, the arrayofItems variable cannot be found, or as stated in the compiler, cannot find symbol: variable arrayOfItems

Please help me :’(
